PackageOracle.name: DA_ACCOUNT_PRIVACY_PREFERENCE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_ACCOUNT_PRIVACY_PREFERENCE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.36.657708000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,private_data_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,private_data_usage_cd IN VARCHAR2
,privacy_preference_ind IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,private_data_cd IN VARCHAR2
,private_data_usage_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_account_privacy_preference;

body.name: DA_ACCOUNT_PRIVACY_PREFERENCE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_ACCOUNT_PRIVACY_PREFERENCE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.36.667993000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,private_data_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,private_data_usage_cd IN VARCHAR2
,privacy_preference_ind IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_privacy_preference.add, parms=' || account_id || '|' || private_data_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || private_data_usage_cd || '|' || privacy_preference_ind || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_account_privacy_preference a
(
a.account_id
,a.private_data_cd
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.private_data_usage_cd
,a.privacy_preference_ind
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.account_id
,add.private_data_cd
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.private_data_usage_cd
,add.privacy_preference_ind
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_privacy_preference.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,private_data_cd IN VARCHAR2
,private_data_usage_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_account_privacy_preference.del, parms=' || account_id || '|' || private_data_cd || '|' || private_data_usage_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_account_privacy_preference a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.account_id = del.account_id
AND a.private_data_cd = del.private_data_cd
AND a.private_data_usage_cd = del.private_data_usage_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_account_privacy_preference.del');

END del;

END da_account_privacy_preference;
